title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 295: Featuring Todd Fedoruk
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Todd Fedoruk. Todd joined (34:37) to discuss his playing career, his time in Philly, fighting in the NHL and a ton more. He even spent the entire weekend with the guys to get to know them before recording. The boys also give a playoff update with the Dallas Stars moving on to the Stanley Cup Final and the Islanders and Lightning heading to Game 6 of the ECF. The guys wrap up talking about a hilarious golf story from Whit and put an end to our Boston trip.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
